definition[0]: the start of an organization or institution
example[0]: a CD collection covering the band from its inception in 1994
definition[1]: the start of a business, organization etc
example[1]: Since its inception in 1965, Medicare has based the payments it makes for each claim on what individual doctors charge.
definition[2]: the date on which an agreement or system becomes effective
example[2]: The customer agrees to guaranteed monthly paymentsat the inception of the agreement.
